h2.div: Enterprise-grade writeback matrix for building connected & secure planning (xP&A / FP&A / EPM) apps

div.p: Inforiver Writeback Matrix is the most comprehensive no-code writeback and planning solution for Power BI. It supports data write back to on-premise & cloud destinations including SQLServer, Azure SQL, Azure Synapse, Fabric Lakehouse/ Warehouse, Dataverse, Snowflake, Databricks, RedShift, BigQuery, OneDrive, SharePoint, and webhook REST API endpoint URL destinations.
The Inforiver Writeback Matrix delivers all features supported by Inforiver Reporting Matrix, and more:

ul.li: Advanced data input field types - including numeric, text, single/multi select dropdowns, check box, person and date fields

Write back/ save data in SQL and Parquet formats; write back from reading view; write back specific rows & columns; write back with context set by external slicers; use webhooks to trigger Power Automate workflows, Azure functions, HTTP / XMLA endpoints
Create secure comments and conversations; tag users; trigger notifications; schedule comment digests;
Create static snapshots after period close or at custom frequencies; compare variances;
Create and compare planning scenarios; write back scenarios

Self-service scheduling and bursting of reports; schedule at custom frequencies; schedule to multiple users based on report tabs, custom filters, etc., schedule PDF/Excel reports to external stakeholders
Enhance writeback scalability and performance through filter context support and chunk processing options

div.p: The key features listed above unlock new use cases that were not possible with Power BI earlier. Some of them include:
div.b: 1. Create templates to capture user data inputs during planning
div.p: Create Excel-like templates where multiple users can enter data in reading view; Leverage advanced security and permissions;
div.b: 2. Build Integrated Planning, Budgeting & Forecasting Applications (xP&A)
div.p: Create discrete planning apps and consolidate plans in a single report. E.g., Consolidate Salary, OpEx, Revenue, and COGS Plans from different reports into a single company-level P&L plan.

ul.li: Create budgets from scratch, or based on prior year actuals
Create forecasts easily for up to 5 years
Perform rolling forecasts with closing periods
Perform top-down planning allocations & distributions (based on other measures or drivers)
Use goal seek capabilities
Lock/unlock specific cells, rows & columns for editing
... and more

div.b: 3. Aggregate, Transform & Stream live data between Power BI reports
div.p: The Writeback Matrix now comes with InfoBridgeÂ®, a new service that helps you aggregate, transform, pivot and stream data live between reports. Imagine these scenarios:

ul.li: A sales forecast app can stream 'quantity sold' to a COGS planning app
A granular daily sales forecast app built for Germany feeds data to a global sales app that summarizes weekly sales by country.

div.p: The writeback matrix delivers comprehensive security and governance.

ul.li: Admin-level security: Control user access to writeback destinations and connections
User-level security: Designate specific users with column-level permissions / ACL (data input fields), row level permissions (insert row), create scenarios, lock/unlock cells, etc.,
Define approval workflow mechanism for data writeback and streaming.
Review & approve adjustments made by users along with comments while showing current vs. previous values.
Use audit log to track who-changed-what-and-when.
